TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DocumentBuilderFactory extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain a parser that produces DOM object trees from XML documents.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

public virtual bool Coalescing { get; set; }
.property instance bool Coalescing

Docs.param: true if the parser produced will convert CDATA nodes to Text nodes and append it to the adjacent (if any) text node; false otherwise.
Docs.summary: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which converts CDATA nodes to Text nodes and appends it to the adjacent (if any) Text node. -or- Specifies that the parser produced by this code will convert CDATA nodes to Text nodes and append it to the adjacent (if any) text node.
Docs.value: true if the factory is configured to produce parsers which converts CDATA nodes to Text nodes and appends it to the adjacent (if any) Text node; false otherwise.

Docs.param: boolean value to ignore comments during processing

MemberSignature.Value: member this.IgnoringElementContentWhitespace : bool with get, set
public virtual bool IgnoringElementContentWhitespace { get; set; }
.property instance bool IgnoringElementContentWhitespace

Docs.summary: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which ignore ignorable whitespace in element content. -or- Specifies that the parsers created by this factory must eliminate whitespace in element content (sometimes known loosely as 'ignorable whitespace') when parsing XML documents (see XML Rec 2.

public virtual Javax.Xml.Validation.Schema? Schema { get; set; }
.property instance class Javax.Xml.Validation.Schema Schema

Docs.param: Schema to use or null to remove a schema.
Docs.summary: Gets the Schema object specified through the #setSchema(Schema schema) method. -or- Set the Schema to be used by parsers created from this factory.
Docs.value: the Schema object that was last set through the #setSchema(Schema) method, or null if the method was not invoked since a DocumentBuilderFactory is created.
